title: Promoting Collaborations with Universities and Institutes in Hainan Province, China: Exploitation of agricultural and food chain waste streams
impactText: KWW and Professor Zhi-Gang Zhou both developed a follow on research proposal on the exploitation of algae for production of fine chemicals and fuels. Chemicals,Energy,Transport Societal
findingsText: This ISIS grant provided travel for KWW to join in meetings and discussions between IFR scientists (under other projects) with representatives of Chinese academic and Industrial organisations. Many of the discussions were confidential and related to the potential to develop approaches to exploit agricultural waste streams for e.g. anaerobic digestion. Of particular note was a series of visits to Shanghai Ocean University (Prof Zhi0Gang Zhou). KWW and Professor Zhi-Gang Zhou both developed a follow on research proposal on the exploitation of algae for production of fine chemicals and fuels. Chemicals,Energy,Transport
